name: breathe (itch) (WayfarerGames)
description:
sometimes, life can be overwhelming. you need a break. a moment to chill out. 

so stop. take a minute and just... breathe.

made for the lv.99 game jam

uses:

  • shapes
  • comfortaa
  • dotween pro
  • 04 pollie soft by summonhue
  • gong brilliant paiste 32" by jenszygar
  • various sounds from sonniss gdc 2023
